metadata.title: Luong Thanh Hoang Phu
metadata.description: Passion, experience, projects, and hobbies — all captured, one byte at a time.

about.description: An introduction to who I am — from the basics and education to the technologies I've worked with.

experience.description: A summary of my hands-on experience in various roles and projects.

projects.description: A showcase of the projects I’ve built — from academic to real-world applications.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Get in touch if you're interested in working together or just want to say hi.

askMe.title: Ask Me Anything
askMe.description: Ask questions to an AI assistant powered by a RAG pipeline. It's built with real data from my portfolio, vector search, and LLM responses — ideal for exploring my experience, projects, and tech skills.

cv.title: Curriculum vitae
cv.description: Curriculum vitae detailing my education, skills, projects, and experiences.

desc.gemini20Flash: Fast lightweight LLM by Google, optimized for real-time interactions
desc.gemini20FlashLite: Smaller, even faster version of Gemini Flash for low-latency tasks
desc.gemini25Flash: Updated fast-response model for interactive tasks, part of Gemini 2.5 series
desc.jinaEmbeddingV3: Multilingual embedding model optimized for speed and dense retrieval
desc.textEmbedding004: High-quality English embedding model for semantic search and retrieval
desc.noReranker: No re-ranking applied. Top documents are selected based only on vector similarity.
desc.cohereRerankV35: Cohere Rerank v3.5 ranks documents by relevance to a query across 100+ languages, boosting RAG and search performance.
